title: Move File Generator
description: Move a file from one Nx project to another and update import paths

file.description: Path to the source file relative to workspace root
file.x-prompt: What is the source file path (relative to workspace root)?

project.description: Name of the target Nx project
project.x-prompt: Which project should the file be moved to?

project-directory.description: Optional subdirectory within the target project's base folder (e.g., 'utils' or 'features/auth'). For libraries, files are placed at sourceRoot/lib/<project-directory>. For applications, files are placed at sourceRoot/app/<project-directory>

skipExport.description: Skip adding export to target project's index file

allowUnicode.description: Allow Unicode characters in file path inputs (less safe)
